TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void FormViewUpdatedEventHandler(object sender, FormViewUpdatedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed FormViewUpdatedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub FormViewUpdatedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As FormViewUpdatedEventArgs)
public delegate void FormViewUpdatedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, FormViewUpdatedEventArgs ^ e);
type FormViewUpdatedEventHandler = delegate of obj * FormViewUpdatedEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 控制項之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制會引發事件時的 [更新] 按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 更新 」) 在控制項內按一下時，但之後控制項更新資料錄。The control raises the event when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") within the control is clicked, but after the control updates the record. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如檢查更新作業的結果時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an update operation, whenever this event occurs. 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需有關事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以程式設計方式新增委派給事件的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventHandler/CS/formviewupdatedeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventHandler/VB/formviewupdatedeventhandlervb.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範如何以宣告方式新增委派給事件的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to declaratively add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]
